author: doogie
msg: FIX: EntityFieldValue has a helper method for fetching the
ModelField; use that instead of fetching the ModelField directly from
the entity.  This is a fix for view-conditions, as the EntityFieldValue
has an internal ModelViewEntity that it uses to fetch the field;
fetching the raw fieldName was not correct in these cases.

author: doogie
msg: FIX: getModelField: when fetching the ModelField, handle the
case of the field being part of a ModelViewEntity.

author: doogie
msg: fetching of lhs a little bit earlier.

author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Refactored to support -help/-? anywhere; also, cmdline parse errors now
send help to System.err, like a normal unix program.
